name: Goddess Nourish Bowl
description: Fit for a goddess, this nourish bowl will have you glowing on the inside and out. For perfect quinoa every time, combine 1 cup quinoa and 2 cups water in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; cook on high 12 min, or until tender. Bonus! Stir 1 tbsp SPG Seasoning or Broth Mix into the Steamer, too.

ingredients.name: lentils, beans, or peas
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cooked or canned, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: veggies, your choice, cooked or raw
Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing or Sesame Ginger Dressing
low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation: Arrange first five ingredients in four serving bowls.
Sprinkle with Poke Bowl Topper Blend or sesame seeds and enjoy!

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, itâ€™s sure to be a hit!
